content.en: Air quality prediction: Machine learning algorithms are being used to predict air quality and air pollutant concentrations in various cities around the world. Algorithms such as Support Vector Regression, Random Forest Regression, and XGBoost are being employed to build models that can accurately forecast air pollution levels. These models take into account meteorological conditions, traffic data, and other environmental parameters to improve air quality prediction.
content.da: Forudsigelse af luftkvalitet: Maskinlæringsalgoritmer bruges til at forudsige luftkvalitet og koncentrationer af luftforurening i forskellige byer rundt om i verden. Algoritmer som Support Vector Regression, Random Forest Regression og XGBoost anvendes til at bygge modeller, der præcist kan forudsige niveauer af luftforurening. Disse modeller tager hensyn til meteorologiske forhold, trafikdata og andre miljøparametre for at forbedre forudsigelsen af luftkvalitet.
